Platform Documentation

Here you'll find handy documentation about our APIs and SDKs. Choose below, or scroll down to select by feature.

web api

web playback sdk

ads api

ios

android

embeds

commercial

EXPLORE BY FEATURE

Music Playback

Let them play! Give users built-in music playback using our API and SDKs.

  • WEB PACK SDK
  • IOS
  • ANDROID
  • EMBEDS

Music Metadata

To allow users to search songs, artists, and playlists, set up the metadata features with our Web API.

  • WEB API

User Data

To access user data like saved tracks and albums, set up the accessibility with our Web API.

  • WEB API

Spotify Connect

Set up Spotify Connect with our Web API to let users control Spotify on speakers, TVs, and other devices.

  • WEB API
  • COMMERCIAL HARDWARE

Personalization

Make it personal! To explore the music listening of users, set up personalized data with the Web API.

  • WEB API
